titleStmt.title: An exposition with practicall observations continued upon the eighth, ninth and tenth chapters of the book of Job being the summe of thirty two lectures, delivered at Magnus neer the bridge, London / by Joseph Caryl ...
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Miller, for Henry Overton ... and Luke Fawne ... and John Rothwell ... and Giles Calvert ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
